Micro-Learning

One-minute exercises that fit perfectly into your daily routine.

Smart Notifications

Spaced-repetition reminders that strengthen long-term memory.

Gamified Progress

Streaks, levels, and challenges that keep you motivated.

About ConjuGo

ConjuGo focuses exclusively on one of the hardest parts of learning French: verb conjugation.

Instead of long lessons and tables, you learn verbs in context, adaptively, and at your own pace.

The app continuously adjusts difficulty based on your mistakes, so you always train what matters most.
